Uses of Class
teamStuff.Hero

  • Packages that use Hero 
    Package Description
    teamStuff  

    • Uses of Hero in teamStuff

      Subclasses of Hero in teamStuff 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cartographer
      The Cartographer class of Hero who's just a nice regular dude with some maps.
      They're heroic maps.
      "We out here reading the planet n shit bruh."
      class  EdgyScaryFiendLord
      The EdgyScaryFiendLord or "Anti-Hero" class of hero.
      Very intimidating and actually kinda tough.
      class  LuckyBoii
      The LuckyBoii class of hero, whose luck affects gameplay in their favour.
      Fairly unremarkable otherwise...
      class  MerchantMan
      The Merchant class of hero, whose bartering abilities benefit the team in the shop.
      However being a weak Merchant hero invites pain and robbery.
      class  Support
      The Support class of hero, who provides support to the team emotionally, which is always needed.
      Has a high recovery and is famous for their good works.
      class  Tank
      The Tank class of hero, who's iron form withstands more damage than lesser beings.
      However Tank heroes are prime targets for explotative shopkeepers.
      Methods in teamStuff that return types with arguments of type Hero 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Hero> Team.getHeroArray() 
      Methods in teamStuff with parameters of type Hero 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Team.addHero(Hero hero)
      Adds a hero to the team's heroArray.
      void HealingItem.apply(Hero hero)
      Applies the healing item's effect to the selected hero.
      Restores health in 25% increments over time, which varies for hero types.
      The time between increments is determined by a hero's innate recovery boost.
      void PowerUp.apply(Hero hero)
      Applies the effect to the hero, boosting the power up's relevant attribute.
      static void Team.removeHero(Hero hero)
      Removes a dead hero from the team
